searchTools: - Keywords: ACTION VERB + ENTITY ("create post", "upload image", "search page") - Variants match: "uploading" finds "upload", "images" finds "image" - BATCH all needs into ONE search: "create post upload image publish" - If tools found → STOP searching, use them - If nothing found → try alternate keywords (2 attempts max) - **BAD:** "create post" then "image update" (redundant when first found tools) - **GOOD:** "create post update image publish" (one batched search)
